product_name: Smith Nomad ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: With a modern navigator frame, the Smith Nomad ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses deliver style and coverage while you roam. Advanced ChromaPop lenses provide enhanced color and clarity. ChromaPop lenses use a proprietary technology to optimize color and increase clarity and definition, enabling you to see the outside world with exceptional vibrance. Polarized glass lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Matte Black and Matte Silver frames feature platinum tinted lenses, ideal for bright days and direct sunlight. Matte Brown frames feature brown tinted lenses that enhance your vision in a wide range of light and weather conditions. Titanium frames feature adjustable nose pads and out-of-sight spring hinges. The Smith Nomad ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses feature hydrophilic Megol temple ends that get tacky when wet for grip during exercise and hot weather.
